translation.en: ♪ Let the light scream out From the high beams ♪
I read that this is how Xavier Woods gets Kofi out of bed before a big match.
translation.ko: 어디서 보니까 제이비어 우즈가 이 기술로 코피를 깨웠다던데

translation.en: [laughing] You did not read that, Grandma.
Ah! Okay, okay! I'm up, I'm up, I'm up.
-All right, kiddo. Time to wake up. -I'm up, Dad.
[Denise] And when you get home from school, clean that room.
Thank you. Any chance you made breakfast, Denise?
translation.ko: 누가 아니래요 혹시 아침밥 있나요, 장모님?

translation.en: "Monday is one step closer to Friday."

translation.ko: - 할머니도 그거 해요? - 그럼! 팔로워도 300명이나 있어

translation.en: Your grandma's about to be an influencer.
translation.ko: 할머니 곧 있으면 인스타 유명인 된다

translation.en: Can you do me a favor
-and not flirt with my t-shirts? -I will second that.
translation.ko: - 내 옷에 작업 걸지 마요 - 동감입니다

translation.en: All right, all right. I'm working on myself.
-So, are we gonna watch Raw tonight? -You know it.
Okay. Well, in that case, I will see you later.
All right, I love you. Have a good day at school.
-How late were you driving that Lyft? -Mmm.
translation.ko: 어제 운전 일 몇 시까지 했어?

translation.en: that now I get to go to my second job.
translation.ko: 이제 다음 일을 하러 갈 수 있다는 거죠

translation.en: [sighs] Steve, it seems like you're burning the candle at both ends. You look tired.
translation.ko: 너무 무리하는 거 아니야? 피곤해 보여

translation.en: But I gotta do what I gotta do.
And I can fix cars in my sleep.
translation.ko: 이제 차 수리는 눈 감고도 하니 괜찮아요

translation.en: Well, don't work on anybody's brakes today.
translation.ko: 사람들 제동 걸 일은 하지 말고

translation.en: [Riyaz] Hey, you guys see WWE's feed this morning?
What do you guys think the announcement is gonna be?
Personally, I hope it's something to do with them looking for a new director.
Look, I'm just saying. There has to be a director back there,
calling out the camera angles, the shots.
translation.ko: 좋은 앵글이랑 장면을 연출해 내는 감독

translation.en: Yes, there is. His name is Vince McMahon.
Well, I think Mr. McMahon would love my ideas.
For example, what about a match filmed entirely by drones?
translation.ko: 예를 들면 드론으로만 경기를 찍는 거지

translation.en: Look, I'm just passionate about my craft. You're not passionate about anything.
translation.ko: 야, 난 내 작품에 열정적인 것뿐이야 넌 그런 것도 없잖아

translation.en: I'm passionate about plenty of things.
wondering if Ariana Grande ever thinks her high ponytail is a little too high.
translation.ko: 아리아나 그란데도 포니테일이 유니콘 뿔 위치란 걸 아는지 연구

translation.en: Speaking of announcements, you gonna do it?
You love it more than any of us.
No. I love WWE more than any of us.
Of course, little Leo won't sign up for the wrestling team.
translation.ko: 꼬맹이 리오가 레슬링부에 들 리 없지

translation.en: Yeah. Of course, little Leo won't sign up for the wrestling team.
I, however, I'm all over this. Mason...
Does our little Leo want to be a WWE Superstar?
translation.ko: 꼬맹이 리오의 꿈이 WWE 슈퍼스타인가 봐

translation.en: Giving people a hard time. How shocking.
translation.ko: 또 친구 괴롭히네 이제 놀랍지도 않다

translation.en: It doesn't matter. I'm picking New Day every time.
Trouble in Paradise is the best finishing move on the planet.
translation.ko: '트러블 인 파라다이스'는 지구 최강 마무리 기술이야

translation.en: [Caleb] I'm sorry, but that's crazy talk.
[Riyaz] What about AJ Styles' Phenomenal Forearm?
Yeah, today is not your day.
You three need a hobby or something.
Uh, Leo was just educating us on the proper way to eat
translation.ko: 리오한테 뭐 먹는 법을 배우고 있었어요

translation.en: Yeah. Isn't that right, big guy?
Well, uh... guess we better head home.
-Lots of homework to do. -Yeah. Straight A's.
[man] Hey, hey! No kids allowed without parents!
translation.ko: 얘, 보호자 없이 들어가면 안 돼!

translation.en: Oh, sorry, sir. We were just admiring the beautiful doors.
I need you to leave now.
Are you with those other delinquents?
And what do you have there?
I found this really cool wrestling mask in this weird secret compartment.
translation.ko: 저 특이한 보관함에서 멋진 레슬링 가면을 찾았어요

translation.en: Do you know whose it was?
Because if you don't, I'll have to burn it.
What about that Ric Flair robe?
And don't tell anybody about the mask. You'll get me into trouble.
Grandma's about to be an influencer, baby.
How was your day, Kid Chaos?
You just let me know. I'll come up to that school
and open up a can of you-know-what, okay?
'Cause you know I'll do anything for you, babe.
I smell something. It doesn't smell right. Is that you?
You know, I sell clothes that people have literally died in. I know that smell.
translation.ko: 나 송장이 입었던 옷도 팔아봤어 딱 그 냄새인데

translation.en: Ooh, don't let him hurt that big, beautiful, sexy body.
translation.ko: 저 섹시한 왕 근육에 흠집 나면 안 되는데

translation.en: Come on! Get up, Big E!
I wish I could be as strong as Kofi.
Everything would be so much better.
Believe me, kiddo. Life isn't all about being strong.
translation.ko: 이 할머니가 아는데 힘센 게 다는 아니야

translation.en: Mom says that all the time.
Or she did. At least, when she was here.
And just because she's not here does not mean that she doesn't love you.
translation.ko: 지금은 여기 없어도 엄마는 널 사랑해

translation.en: And hey, Big E! You never forget that Grandma is here,
translation.ko: 빅 E, 이 할머니가 여기 있다는 걸 알아둬

translation.en: willing and ready and waiting for you, baby.
Hey, you guys. Sorry I'm late.
The garage was a mess today.
Oh, look, Dad. It's the best part.
Oh, yeah. This is where Big E makes his pecs bounce.
translation.ko: 맞아, 빅 E 가슴이 막 춤을 춰

translation.en: Up and down, up and down. Oh, my God, it drives me wild.
translation.ko: 위, 아래, 위, 아래 사람 미치게 한다니까

translation.en: For the record, we have different opinions on what the best part is.
translation.ko: 난 재미없는데 할머니는 자꾸 저런 게 재밌대요

translation.en: Dad, remember when you said every wrestler has a weakness?
translation.ko: 아빠, 레슬링 선수들은 다 약점이 있다고 했죠?

translation.en: I guess I did say that, yeah.
Well, I think Jimmy Usos' is his temper.
He ran straight into Kofi. He wasn't thinking straight.
Ooh. Look. They're about to make a big announcement.
The most must-see WWE Superstar in history, The Miz,
and the time has finally come.
You have a once-in-a-lifetime chance to become the next NXT Superstar.
translation.ko: NXT 슈퍼스타가 될 인생 최고의 기회요

translation.en: So if you think you have what it takes,
get your butt down to Fallbridge.
Uh... I'm sorry, hang on. Fallbridge?
The WWE is hosting a winner-take-all tournament,
translation.ko: WWE가 토너먼트를 열어 최종 승자를 가릴 텐데요

translation.en: where two finalists will square off inside a steel cage.
translation.ko: 두 명의 결승 진출자가 철창 링에서 대결합니다

translation.en: The winner will receive not only an NXT contract,
The WWE is coming right here to Fallbridge?
It was stale. I threw it out.
Dad, remember that time we went to Raw, and Mom met Becky Lynch after the show?
translation.ko: 아빠, '로' 경기 보러 가서 엄마가 베키 린치 만난 거 기억나요?

translation.en: That was a very fun time for your mother.
I have like two or three emergency sandwiches
You change the topic every time he brings up his mother,
translation.ko: 애가 엄마 얘기만 하면 말을 돌리거나

translation.en: or run out to the garage and work on that car.
Well, what happened with Rachel is a sensitive subject,
and I'm just not quite sure how to broach it.
[Steve] To my credit, I only avoid talking to him
translation.ko: 제가 무조건 그러나요? 그 얘기만 못 하는 거죠

translation.en: [Denise] Steve, Rachel leaving was a surprise to all of us.
[Steve] Can we talk about anything else? Please?
I mean, there are 1,000 things that I would rather do,
than talk about my wife leaving me for someone else,
You know, it may not mean much, but I, um...
adjusted my schedule just to take a few weeks off
translation.ko: 나도 겨우 시간 내서 몇 주만이라도 온 거야

translation.en: to come here and try to help you through this.
Look, as soon as I can pay down the bank,
I will go from two jobs to one job,
and I will find some semblance of normalcy.
But I still owe the bank like $20,000.
If I don't pay it soon, I...
[Denise] I told you. I'll take out a second mortgage on the store.
[Steve] No. Come on, I can't. This is my mess. I'll clean it up.
translation.ko: 그런 부담은 못 드려요 제 일은 제가 해결해야죠

translation.en: Although, it's almost a crime to hide this studly face from the world.
translation.ko: 그래도 잘생긴 미모를 가리면 이 세상에 민폐지

translation.en: [deep-voiced] That was just you being you, big man.
You're a limousine-riding, jet-flying cool dude
[regular voice] I wet the bed until I was eight.
[deep-voiced] I wet the bed until I was eight.
[regular voice] Why did that sound so much cooler?
[deep-voiced] Are you ready to face the man of the hour?
The man with the power, the guy who's too sweet to be sour? Ooh!
translation.ko: 강하고 새콤 달달한 남자가 되는 거야

translation.en: I've been all around the world rocking rings across the globe,
translation.ko: 내가 전 세계를 누비면서 링 좀 흔들고 다녔는데

translation.en: and I have never seen a sorrier sight than you.
translation.ko: 너 같은 짠한 몰골은 처음 본다

translation.en: "Legend has it that this mask's mystical powers
only work for competitors who are truly deserving of its magic.
translation.ko: '그 마력은 가치에 걸맞은 주인을 만나야만 발휘되고'

translation.en: The mask itself decides who is worthy.
The mask was last seen 50 years ago."
[Trevor] Your little buddy Leo ran away from us.
So now, we're gonna have to take out our frustrations on you two.
[Trevor] I'm gonna break your face, nerd.
[Riyaz] I prefer the term "intellectually advanced person."
I think you should leave them alone.
You, however, are a different story.
But we're the ones hanging by our underwear.
Second door to the left, right before the bathrooms.
translation.ko: 화장실 나오기 전 왼쪽 두 번째 문

translation.en: They could have really hurt you.
Just promise me no more fighting. Okay?
They're bigger than you, sure, but you're stronger than them.
translation.ko: 걔들은 몸집만 크지 네가 훨씬 강해

translation.en: Wow, that was really sweet, man.
You are definitely getting five stars. Yeah.
[Riyaz] That was the coolest thing ever today.
I guess that was pretty cool.
My dad didn't like it, though.
The whole school is talking about it.
It seemed physically impossible, no offense.
Tomorrow in Fallbridge, WWE kicks off its search
to find the next NXT Superstar.
But one man has already registered.
Or should I say one monster?
The entire WWE roster should be shaking in their boots right now,
That's me, I'm his manager. Remember that name, too.
Dude, he's huge. He's gotta be a shoo-in for that $50,000.
[deep-voiced] All you jabronis better know your role, and stay out of my lane.
translation.ko: 가소로운 녀석들 너희 주제에 맞게 패배할 준비나 해라

translation.en: "I came here to chew bubblegum and kick butt,
translation.ko: 껌 씹으면서 힘 좀 쓰러 왔는데

translation.en: but I'm all out of bubblegum."
No. I can't pull that one off.
Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls,
[scoffs] Chuck E. Cheese is a block over, kid.
You're a little small for this, aren't you?
Whatever. What is your wrestling name?
Okay, come on. If you wanna compete, I need a name.
And you should really think about changing,
Get out of my seat, you little worm.
Just ignore him, bruh. Come on.
But you can call me Smooth.
[sing-songy] and I got this silky smooth voice.
I like it. Nice to meet-- [sniffs]
It smells like old bus seats.
-["I Came to Play" by Jim Johnston] -It's on.
Who here is ready to be a Superstar?
That's right. I'm The Miz. It is my pleasure
translation.ko: 좋아요, 더 미즈입니다 단 한 명의 스타를 발굴하는 NXT 경기에 잘 오셨습니다

translation.en: to welcome you to this winner-take-all NXT competition.
translation.ko: 단 한 명의 스타를 발굴하는 NXT 경기에 잘 오셨습니다

translation.en: I'll be your awesome host, watching on as we...
...will then have three weeks of bone-crushing bouts
with the final two meeting inside a steel cage--
translation.ko: 두 명의 결승 진출자가 철창 링에서 대결합니다

translation.en: Uh, sorry we're late, but I had to feed the beast.
He had four whole chickens for lunch today.
Yeah. You should've seen the look on the chicken's faces.
Oh, my gosh. Look at this motley crew.
This is gonna be easier than I thought.
You know what? I'm just kidding.
Good luck... to none of youse.
-Are you done? -I am, yes. Thank you very much.
-[announcer] Barrel Toss. -["Reyna" by Niña Dioz playing]
Let's see how you guys are on the top rope.
[The Miz] Come on, big guy. Gotta go all the way to the top.
All right, Kid Chaos. Your turn to show off those skills.
translation.ko: 좋아요, 혼돈의 마스크 실력 한번 보여줘요

translation.en: [The Miz] And the next finalist is...
And the last finalist moving on to the tournament is...
Miz, you made the right choice.
Because I'm the best there is, the best there was,
and the best there ever will be.
[Denise] So this is a stinky mask with powers. Hmm.
translation.ko: 이 냄새 나는 게 마법 가면?

translation.en: You can't tell Dad. He'll kill me.
Baby, you found a magical mask.
It's not like you got a D in science.
and then we can keep the house.
I overheard you and Dad talking.
that is not your concern, okay?
You're 11 years old, and I'm sure your dad will figure out a way to save the house.
But what if this is the way?
Not just to save the house. To fix everything.
translation.ko: 집도 지켜야 하지만 다른 문제도 많잖아요

translation.en: Dad won't have to work so much. And who knows?
translation.ko: 아빠도 일 줄일 수 있고 또 혹시 알아요?

translation.en: Maybe Mom will even come back.
If I let you do this...
you cannot get hurt, or I will kill you.
like I really am a WWE Superstar.
translation.ko: 내가 WWE 슈퍼스타가 된 것 같다니까요

translation.en: It somehow takes what's inside of me and makes it awesome.
Like, I can say or do anything.
Just please promise me you'll be careful.
[Riyaz] Dude, where were you last night?
I still don't know who I'm rooting for.
Smooth Operator seems kind of cool.
I like the little guy. Kid Chaos.
Oh, yeah. He's crazy strong for his size.
Why don't you go talk to her?
Oh, no. I can't do that.
She's like smart and cool and popular.
Then you go talk to her.
Yeah, I don't see myself doing that.
Come on, dude. You were strong enough to take on Trevor and Mason.
translation.ko: 쫄지 마, 너 트레버랑 메이슨 혼내줄 정도로 강하잖아

translation.en: [Kid Chaos] Some say a life without books is a life not worth living.
translation.ko: 누군가 책 없는 삶은 무의미하다고 했지

translation.en: Don't wanna get you sick. Wouldn't be cool.
Are you kidding? I love Rick Riordan.
Have you read The Trials of Apollo?
So, Erica, I've noticed we're in a few classes together.
translation.ko: 에리카, 우리 수업이 몇 개 겹치던데

translation.en: I was wondering if you wanna get our study on sometime?
Um... actually, how about we talk on the phone?
I hope you are hungry [with Italian accent] because I have made for you,
Real authentic. I feel like I'm in Tuscany.
translation.ko: 너무 잘 만들어서 토스카나 온 줄 알았네

translation.en: Denise... I'll ask you to hold your sarcasm, please,
because clearly my son enjoys my cooking. Wow, you really...
translation.ko: 리오는 맛있게 먹잖아요 세상에, 잘 먹네

translation.en: You're very hungry. Are you okay?
Well... I've been burning a lot of calories lately.
Must be all that brain busting I'm doing at school.
Well, I did piledrive you to the library yesterday.
translation.ko: 내가 어제 도서관에다 메다꽂아 놓긴 했지

translation.en: My teacher got a real super kick out of me doing all that extra credit.
translation.ko: 제 성적이 너무 좋아서 선생님도 한 방 먹으셨죠

translation.en: Well, there's no way you're gonna powerbomb your next big test.
translation.ko: 다음 시험 때는 선생님 들었다 놨다 하지 마

translation.en: put the sleeper hold on the brake line of a 1988 Toyota Tercel, so...
Our 16 competitors are jacked up and ready to do this.
Oh, thanks, bro. How're you feeling?
I feel like I'm about to hop on a lightning bolt,
and ride it like a bucking bronco.
Hey! Hey! Don't you touch my baby!
That's right! Get him, baby, get him!
So good I gotta get the selfie!
Erica, good to hear from you.
Oh. Hey. What are you doing here?
I know I said I'd call, but I take dance lessons right down the street,
translation.ko: 전화하려고 했는데 댄스 학원이 이 근처거든

translation.en: so I figured I'd just come over. Is that okay?
Of course, it's okay. It's fine, sweetie. [laughs]
Yeah, it's totally okay. I just, uh...
Uh... give me a second, okay?
You know, that is so crazy that you're a dancer,
Like, back in the 80s, I was a pop lock master.
Oh, my God. I was so funky fresh.
Okay, she's here. In your home.
translation.ko: 정신 차려, 에리카가 왔어 우리 집에!

translation.en: Yeah, sure. But first, let's get you a drink.
I'm good. I got my water.
So you want another drink to go with your water. Don't worry, I'm on it.
translation.ko: 물과 마실 음료수 달라고? 알았어, 갖다줄게

translation.en: Sorry if I was a little jumpy there.
In fact, some people say I'm cool as the other side of the pillow.
translation.ko: 오히려 너무 쿨해서 옆에 있으면 춥다나

translation.en: And since I don't want to get you sick with my cold,
translation.ko: 그리고 너한테 감기 옮기면 안 되니까

translation.en: I think I should maybe stay in here while we work.
But first, let's get you a drink.
Erica, I think this stuff is really gonna knock your socks off.
Hey! Um, look who it is.
Never buy perfume off the back of a truck.
lemony and, uh, full of lemons.
translation.ko: 레몬 향이 나고... 레몬 맛이 완전 진해

translation.en: They're ripe and stuff, and it's like... squeeze it.
translation.ko: 잘 익은 레몬을 짜서 만든 거라...

translation.en: No lassos this time, Tiny Dancer.
translation.ko: 올가미질은 꿈 깨라 이 까불이 콩알아

translation.en: I'm gonna try to touch you as little as possible,
The match just started. How are you so sweaty?
translation.ko: 방금 시작했는데 왜 벌써 육수 범벅이야?

translation.en: Don't ask questions you don't want answers to.
I think it's time to start cooking...
[Smooth] So, now it's you versus me to see who takes on Samson.
[Kid Chaos] It's been a long road, huh?
I've been at this for nearly a decade.
translation.ko: 난 레슬링 한 지 10년 다 됐어

translation.en: Even started training right out of college.
Whoa! You've been in it for that long?
Yeah, I put in the time, bro.
Even had a couple tryouts for WWE.
So this time, I've gotta win,
Nobody wants it more than me.
You gonna take it easy on me out there?
Depends. Are you gonna take it easy on me?
-Fair enough. It was worth a try. -[chuckling]
The lighting is better over here.
You know, at this point, your followers are pretty much 80% bot.
You're just jealous because I don't follow you back.
No, it's just a fact. We're all pretty much followed by bots.
Hey, hey! How's it going, man?
I was realizing that we haven't spent much time together, you know?
translation.ko: 우리 요즘 얘기를 많이 못 했네

translation.en: And... we definitely haven't had time to have a man-to-man conversation, so...
Before yesterday, she didn't even exist.
I had to hear about her from...
Well, if you really wanna have a man-to-man talk,
I was thinking, and since Mom's gone and stuff--
I do wanna have a man-to-man talk.
And I was thinking, too, uh, you know,
I haven't had a chance really to show you what I do, and so I was thinking,
translation.ko: 아빠가 하는 일 보여준 적 없잖아 그래서 걱정되더라고

translation.en: God forbid you break down on the side of the road or something,
translation.ko: 길 한복판에서 차 고장 나면 난감하니까

translation.en: you should know what a fuel filter is.
Which is this thing right here.
I'm sorry, but can we maybe do this another time?
I'm supposed to meet with my friends at the diner.
Yeah. Caleb got an A on his Spanish test.
Yeah, man, go. Have fun with your friends.
When will I get to see Mom again?
Have fun. Have a good time.
What if Kid Chaos is actually just Kevin Hart in a mask,
translation.ko: 혹시 혼돈의 마스크가 배우 케빈 하트 아닐까?

translation.en: That's insane. He's not that small.
translation.ko: 말이 되냐? 그 정도로 작지는 않지

translation.en: Erica, why're you hanging out with these weirdos?
They're not weirdos, they're my friends. And also,
translation.ko: 빙구가 아니라 내 친구들이야 그리고 잊었어?

translation.en: one of them hung you up by your underpants the other day.
So maybe you should be a little nicer.
So, wait. We're like official friends?
I mean, yeah. Do you guys not wanna be--
So, any of you doing the talent show?
I was gonna submit my short film, but I doubt I'll finish it in time.
translation.ko: 단편영화 내려고 했는데 시간이 촉박할 것 같아

translation.en: You haven't even started it, man.
That's why I doubt I'll finish it.
Wait. Are you gonna do it?
Put your dancing lessons to use?
I don't know. It's a big crowd,
and I'd be up there all alone. So...
what if I dance with you?
but if you want me to, I'll give it a try. I mean...
[cashier] I am. I am. I am.
Let's go! Let's go! I ain't got all day!
There's a guy robbing the place, and you're telling us not to freak out?
I'm sorry I didn't tell you guys before, and...
If I gotta ask you one more time, this place is gonna get messy. Let's go!
translation.ko: 험한 꼴 보기 싫으면 꾸물대지 말고 담아!

translation.en: See you in what, five to ten years?
So what made you decide to help?
That's just how the people's champ is wired.
When I'm around, crime is down.
translation.ko: 제가 있으면 악당이 힘을 못 써요

translation.en: He's a hero now. [laughing] He's a hero now.
Please turn it off. Turn it off.
Can you not destroy everything you touch?
translation.ko: 아무거나 막 박살 내지 좀 마

translation.en: [sighs] I got that on Black Friday.
I cannot watch you eat any more butter.
[laughs] You see what I did there?
You know, let me get this straight.
So Leo tries to open up to you
about his mom a little earlier, and you just...
when they're upside down, because then the water is not in the...
[stammering] It doesn't matter, but, like, gravity is--
Hey! Hey! Don't get mad at me.
translation.ko: 어디 가? 왜 나한테 화를 내?

translation.en: -I'm not mad at you. -Yeah, you are.
I'm mad at myself, honestly. I just...
I don't have the answers. I don't...
know when he's going to see Rachel next, and it sucks.
translation.ko: 레이첼을 언제 보게 될지 말을 못 해줘서 화가 나요

translation.en: Well, I hate to say it, but Leo needs a little more.
You want me to tell him that his mom met someone else and moved to New York?
translation.ko: 엄마가 다른 남자랑 뉴욕으로 떠났다고 하라고요?

translation.en: And apparently doesn't have time to call him?
You think he can handle that?
My daughter could use a little help in the mom department.
And yes, she should call more.
It was so much easier with the two of us, and I...
translation.ko: 같이 키울 때는 훨씬 쉬웠는데 솔직히 너무...

translation.en: This is gonna be our new normal.
And you gotta stop running from it and hiding out here in the garage.
translation.ko: 난처해질 때마다 차고에 숨으러 오지 말고

translation.en: -hiding out here in the garage. -Yes, you are.
Yeah, I guess... I guess I am.
Steve, his mother left, but his dad is still here.
I can't believe we're friends with a superhero.
Or Andrew Garfield. [both] Or Tobey Maguire.
Dude, we're totally going to your semifinals.
We need to make t-shirts, stat.
when you talked to me in the library that day?
I was just trying to make a good impression.
For the record, I prefer the real Leo.
translation.ko: 사실 난 네 원래 모습이 좋아

translation.en: And you know what? I think you kind of inspired me.
translation.ko: 나 말이야 너 때문에 용기를 얻었어

translation.en: I think I'm gonna sign up for the talent show.
I'll take you up on that offer to dance with me.
I don't need you to do much.
Just, you know, bust a few small moves.
Small moves. I can do small moves.
[Frankie] I almost feel sorry for her!
Aw, look it. Dad said good luck tonight.
I mean, he meant with the talent show, but still.
He's also taking the weekend off.
Maybe you guys can get together and talk?
Yeah, sure. Maybe. I just can't think about that right now.
Kid Chaos is about to check into the Smackdown Hotel,
translation.ko: 이 혼돈의 마스크가 스맥다운 호텔로 가서

translation.en: and take the elevator all the way up to the penthouse,
and do what he does best.
It's almost scary how you do that.
[Kid Chaos] All the fans out there.
And they're here to see us. Crazy.
I've dreamed about this ever since I was ten years old.
And now, our last semifinal match of the evening,
with the winner facing Samson next week in a steel cage.
translation.ko: 승자는 다음 주에 삼손과 철창 링에서 결승전을 펼치죠

translation.en: ♪ No one can step to this ♪
And no one should sing like that!
You're terrible! Feast your eyes on a real man!
-Feast your eyes on a real man! -Get out of here! Beat it!
Feast your eyes on that man! Half man, half mountain!
translation.ko: 저게 진짜 남자지! 어깨 떡 벌어진 거 봐!

translation.en: Look-- What are you looking at?
And his opponent, from right here in Fallbridge...
I guess he put on his two left shoes today. [laughs]
Hey! They put something on my shoe!
[Frankie] He must've hit his head on the turnbuckle one too many times!
translation.ko: 머리를 하도 맞아서 어떻게 된 모양이군!

translation.en: And besides, once the bell rings, the match must go on!
He's right. There's nothing I can do.
Come on! Get up, baby, get up!
Hold him down! Hold him down!
What was that, ref? That was a fast count!
I did not put that stuff on my shoe.
I want everybody in this arena and at home to know something.
translation.ko: 관중과 시청자 여러분 드릴 말씀이 있습니다

translation.en: Smooth Operator is a good man!
I'm gonna bring a dictionary to the ring.
Because I'm going to teach Samson a new word.
Ah! What're you sneaking up on me like that for?
Donuts go inside. Donuts go inside to the giant man who eats everything.
translation.ko: 얼른 도넛이나 갖다줘요 먹는 기계가 따로 없다니까

translation.en: Kid Chaos. What're you doing to me?
I think you literally broke the laws of physics.
I mean, what else can you do in that mask?
It's not that type of magic.
Sorry to interrupt. We need you for the post-match press conference.
translation.ko: 얘기 중에 미안한데 경기 종료 기자회견 있어요

translation.en: You mean, another public forum to make fun of Samson?
Oh, right. Can you give us a minute?
I'll leave as soon as I'm done.
It's a kid! [muffled] It's a kid. It's a kid.
All right. Well, I'll drive you kids there.
Leo, you sure you don't want us to wait with you?
I'm okay. Thanks, Grandma. I've gotta deal with this.
Do not take your socks off in my car.
It's a magic mask. It's a magic mask.
So, Samson. How do you feel about the upcoming match?
-[laughing] -Are you excited to be in the finals?
And you can quote him on that.
Why don't you tell us what's going on in that little brain of yours, okay?
translation.ko: 그 앙증맞은 머리로 무슨 생각을 하시나?

translation.en: And be sure to use your big boy voice.
That's my name said three times.
Seriously, what is up with these grunts?
[gasps] In fact, let's start with an easy one.
Now you've done and did it.
[laughs] Watch out. You got him mad now.
Samson, a man of no words, no class,
All right. Oh, you shook the beehive.
Why are you grabbing me? I didn't break the table. Ow!
translation.ko: 왜 나한테 난리야? 내가 테이블 부쉈어?

translation.en: We need you to shoot a couple of quick promos for the match. Cool?
-[Frankie] All right, that's enough! -[Samson grunting angrily]
All right, I'm sorry, but calm down.
He embarrassed you. I get it.
But I... I have some great news.
That's right, he's just a kid.
I saw it with my own eyes.
I don't want you to worry. Okay?
So tune in Saturday night to watch Kid Chaos
translation.ko: 토요일 밤을 기대하세요 이 혼돈의 마스크가

translation.en: That's how you point, Rog. You see how he pointed there? You see? Uh.
Miss Cartwright, could you move us to the end?
translation.ko: 선생님, 저희 순서 미뤄주시면 안 돼요?

translation.en: Still waiting on half your act?
Well, I'll just pop you at the end.
[man] Kid! Can I get a selfie?
[woman] Hey, can I get a selfie?
Up next, we have Erica Bartlett and Leo Thompson.
translation.ko: 다음은 에리카 바틀릿과 리오 톰프슨의 무대입니다

translation.en: I don't know any of my friends.

translation.ko: 얘들아 진짜 미안해 기자회견이 너무 늦게 끝났어

translation.en: The press conference just went on forever.
translation.ko: 진짜 미안해 기자회견이 너무 늦게 끝났어

translation.en: They hounded me. I left as soon as I could.
translation.ko: 다들 계속 따라오잖아 최대한 빨리 온 거야

translation.en: I will stay here until every last one of you gets a photo.
Come on. Are you seriously mad?
Yeah. You ditched me, and this was all your idea.
translation.ko: 그래, 약속을 어겼잖아 먼저 같이 하자고 해놓고

translation.en: I know, but... I was just doing my job, okay?
I mean, it's only a talent show.
I've kind of got more important things going on right now.
Sorry that I'm Kid Chaos and you're not.
translation.ko: 난 혼돈의 마스크야 너희랑 달라서 미안하다

translation.en: No. What you are is a jerk.
Guys, I've had a long night.
The only reason I messed with you
is because you always mess with me,
And if we're being honest, it does get harder again.
You know, your grandfather and I actually had a great discussion
translation.ko: 아빠도 할아버지랑 그런 얘기 많이 했어

translation.en: about how hard it is to grow up...
in the garage working on the Camaro.
translation.ko: 차 고치는 건 또 얼마나 힘든지

translation.en: I don't wanna work on the stupid car with you, Dad.
That's not really what I meant.
Dad, it is what you meant.
Because whenever things get too serious, you go and work on the car.
I... I just wanna be alone.
Talk to me, get your mind right.
I thought the mask would make everything better.
translation.ko: 가면만 있으면 다 좋아질 줄 알았어요

translation.en: I thought it was gonna fix things,
You know, the magical mask is not what makes you strong.
translation.ko: 마법 가면만 쓴다고 강해지는 게 아니야

translation.en: Real strength comes from here... and here.
Dad said something like that the other day, too.
Listen, kiddo. Your dad really loves you.
And I know your mom leaving, it's been rough on you.
It's been hard on me, too.
I gotta tell you, it hasn't been easy on your dad, either.
When you came on stage, I had no clue what was gonna happen.
[Caleb] Yeah, I've been watching you guys rehearse,
so I knew most of it.
I'm pretty vigilant. It was mostly freestyle.
translation.ko: 많이 떨리긴 했는데 그냥 프리스타일로 했어

translation.en: I was a jerk, and you're my best friends.
I let all this stuff go to my head.
Yeah. We've been talking, and we've decided,
you can't really judge a man until you've walked a mile in his mask.
I know that seems unrelated, but still,
So, do you still wanna come--
[Corey Graves] WWE Universe, tonight is the night.
Two rookies will do battle inside of a 16-foot-high steel cage,
translation.ko: 두 신인 선수가 5m 높이의 철창 링에서

translation.en: vying not only for an NXT contract,
And one of them might even die.
No. No one's gonna die. That's--
I'm sorry. Have you seen the size of Kid Chaos?
translation.ko: 뭘 모르시네 혼돈의 마스크 몸집 못 봤어요?

translation.en: But the action is gonna be incredible.
So, how're you feeling, Kid Chaos?
Good. I just wish Dad could be here.
Okay, okay! Everybody ready for a big night?
Hey, hey, get out of here!
There he is. Don't worry. Your secret's safe with us, okay?
translation.ko: 거기 있군, 걱정 마 비밀은 지켜줄게

translation.en: Yeah, it is. Go get something to eat.
I'm not here to start any trouble, I come in peace.
We're all competitive people, okay? It's human nature.
translation.ko: 이기기 싫은 사람 없잖아 사람이 다 그렇지

translation.en: Yeah. Things got a little out of hand.
I'm sorry, okay? We're both sorry.
Anyway, congratulations on making it this far, okay?
May the best man, or kid, win.
[Frankie] Come on. Give him his space.
Come on. You gotta warm up, anyway.
Nice delivery, but I ain't buying it.
So, I went to the thrift store the other day,
It wasn't as nice as my vintage shop,
but I was able to pick out a few pieces,
translation.ko: 쓸 만한 거 몇 개 건져서

translation.en: Huh? Huh? What do you think about this?
I didn't think you'd make it.
Come on, man. You know I'd never miss a cage match.
translation.ko: 무슨 소리야? 철창 경기는 직관이 필수지
첫 번째 선수는 시보이건의 인간 분쇄기

translation.en: I'm not worthy. I'm not worthy, Samson!
♪ I'm always ready We're always ready ♪
You mean to tell me that this guy is taking on that guy?
What am I missing here? Am I missing something?
I know how it looks, but,
Kid Chaos has been crushing guys twice his size.
translation.ko: 덩치가 자기 두 배여도 거뜬히 해치운다니까

translation.en: [announcer] And finally, your very special guest referee,
Come on, Red! Call it right, Red! Call it right!
Keep it fair. Keep it fair.
Only one will emerge a WWE NXT Superstar.
translation.ko: 오직 한 선수만이 WWE NXT의 슈퍼스타가 됩니다

translation.en: What is this? Kid Chaos unmasked!
I told you someone was gonna die.
Okay, Samson. Put the mask on.
Come on, let's go. Pull it down.
Use your muscles! Suck in your cheek.
Does anybody have any petroleum jelly?
Listen, Samson. Let's... Let's work something out.
if you don't beat me up now,
maybe I'll teach you how to talk.
New plan. If you don't kill me,
translation.ko: 그럼 다른 거, 나 안 죽이면

translation.en: I'll introduce you to some new people,
help you make a new friend.
That's not very nice, am I right?
Hey, Samson, leave him alone. He's just a kid.
He's trying to escape! He's trying to escape! Get him, Samson!
[Sheamus] Put him down! Put him down!
Stay up there, baby. Stay up there.
Hey! I said he's just a kid.
Back off, Samson. I'm the official here.
Samson, get up there! Get that mask!
Samson, he's going for the mask! Get the mask!
If he gets the mask before us, we're done!
Get the mask! You gotta get up there before him!
translation.ko: 가면 잡아! 쟤보다 먼저 올라가야 해!

translation.en: Get up there and get the mask!
Leo, get down here! This is your dad!
No-- You're right. Security. It's fine. We're gonna--
Leo, get down! I'm his dad! I'm his dad!
Dad, what are you doing here?
What am I do-- Leo, what are you doing here?
That being said, I think you're gonna be okay.
Yes. Remember how I told you every superstar has a weakness?
translation.ko: 그래, 아빠가 대단한 사람도 다 약점이 있다고 했지?

translation.en: He's sweating. Look at his hands! They're practically trembling!
translation.ko: 땀 흘리고, 손도 봐! 덜덜 떨잖아!

translation.en: he refused to jump off the top rope.
-That's because he has… -[both] A fear of heights!
[Frankie] Fear of heights? Are you guys crazy?
Fear of heights? This guy loves heights!
He talks about heights all the time. He...
translation.ko: 어디 못 올라가서 난리라고! 쟤가 작년에는 에베레스트도 갔다 왔어

translation.en: He climbed Mount Everest last year, so...
Keep climbing or I will send you back to that circus in Sheboygan!
If you really wanna be the next NXT Superstar,
you know someday you'll have to get past this.
So, why don't you do it now? Right now?
Look down, Samson. I dare you.
Did you see that? Oh, my God!
[Steve] I told you that's my son!
I'm so sorry about all this.
And I'm sorry for what I said.
No, it's okay. You were right.
And I should have told you...
about Mom and everything. It's just...
It makes me sad, and so I was scared that you would be sad, too. But...
translation.ko: 아빠가 너무 슬퍼서 넌 힘들게 하기 싫었어

translation.en: I have to be brave, just like you.
And neither of us needs a magical mask to do that.
There's one thing that you can always, always count on.
And that's I'm not going anywhere.
♪ Tell me when you're ready We're always ready ♪
One for the books, Kid Chaos!
Or should I call you Leo?
Eleven and a half, technically, but yeah.
Leo, how did you do it?
at the end of the day,
I had some really great people in my corner.
We can't have an 11-year-old wrestling in WWE, can we?
That's correct. We cannot have an 11-year-old
wrestling in the WWE. It's not safe. He's not allowed to do it.
translation.ko: 위험한 레슬링 하는 걸 허락할 순 없습니다

translation.en: But I have a way we can fix this.
Since I won, how about I pick my replacement?
translation.ko: 제가 우승했으니까 다른 사람 추천해도 돼요?

translation.en: Do you have someone in mind?
He's wanted this ever since he was my age.
Leo, there's just one thing left to do.
I don't think so, you little brat!
Hold on. Let me take a picture!
All right, boys, bring it in. Shake hands,
and give me a good, clean match.
Let's see how well you do without the mask, Leo.
translation.ko: 가면 안 쓰고는 얼마나 잘하는지 보자

translation.en: Well, let me get a quick selfie with the winner for the 'gram.
And I mean Instagram, not the other G word.
That was a brave thing you did.
I had to come congratulate you myself.
And you must be the proud father?
Got nothing to say? I have never seen that before. [scoffs]
Well, the pleasure is mine, Denise.
Hey, man, I gotta be honest.
I didn't think you could pull it off.
But I'm so glad that you proved me wrong.
And it's too bad you can't join us in the WWE.
What're you talking about? I'll see you in ten years, Kofi.
And then, I'll show you the true meaning of impressive.
Did you just see that? He kissed...
